name: Vysta
subtitle: A movie discovery and watchlist management web application
description: A React-based movie web app powered by TMDB. Users can browse and search for movies, create accounts, log in, and manage a personal watchlist. Built with React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and MongoDB for data storage.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: View trending movies, top rated films, and upcoming releases in a carousel layout.

features.name: Browse Movies
features.description: Browse movies by genre with pagination. Each genre has its own dedicated page for easier discovery.

features.name: Movie Details
features.description: View detailed movie information including plot, cast, and similar movie recommendations.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Search for movies with real-time results.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Register and login to access personalized features like watchlists.

features.name: Watchlist
features.description: Add movies to your personal watchlist and remove them as needed. Requires user account.

name: Kanva
subtitle: A modern, collaborative Kanban Board web application
description: A collaborative Kanban Board web app built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Users can sign up, create and manage multiple project boards with drag-and-drop functionality.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Simple user registration and login system. Create an account to save your boards and access them later.

features.name: Board Archive & Management
features.description: Complete board lifecycle management with controls for creating, organizing, and maintaining your project boards.

features.name: Interactive Kanban Board
features.description: Clean, responsive Kanban interface that adapts to your workflow needs. With customizable columns and real time updates.

features.name: Section and Task Management
features.description: Comprehensive task organization with flexible section management and task operations.

features.name: Task Details Viewer
features.description: Comprehensive task management modal with advanced features for detailed project tracking.

features.name: Drag and Drop
features.description: Intuitive drag and drop interface for effortless task and section management.

features.name: Team Collaboration
features.description: invite team members to collaborate on your boards, send invitation using their username.

name: BiasX
subtitle: A Feature-Based Framework for Explaining and Quantifying Gender Bias in Face Classification.
description:
Undergraduate Thesis Project | Best Paper, College of Science. 

BiasX is a comprehensive framework for quantifying and explaining gender bias in face classification models using a feature-based approach. Rather than just measuring bias with traditional metrics, BiasX reveals which facial features contribute to gender-specific misclassifications, providing explainable and actionable insights.

features.name: Feature Level Bias Analysis
features.description: Identifies bias contributions from specific facial features (eyes, nose, lips, etc.).

features.name: Visual Explanation Generation
features.description: Creates activation maps to visualize model decision regions.

features.name: Comprehensive Metrics
features.description: Calculates both traditional (equalized odds) and feature-based bias scores.

features.name: Dataset Management
features.description: Handles facial image datasets with demographic attributes.

features.name: Experiment Framework
features.description: Supports controlled experiments with manipulated gender distributions and masked facial features.

features.name: Interactive Visualization
features.description: Includes a web application for exploring bias analysis results.

name: AIDentifye
subtitle: Eye Disease Recognition Software
description: Collaborated to develop a web-based AI application for eye disease detection and classification. Led the complete AI development pipeline including data preprocessing, model training, and deployment, while experimenting with multiple CNN pre-trained architectures to optimize accuracy. Also served as the primary front-end developer for the project. Also known as Project EDR.

features.name: Assess
features.description: Capture or upload images of your eyes for assessment.

features.name: Eye Detection
features.description: Automatically crop and assess eye from facial images

features.name: Library
features.description: Explore information on six common eye conditions: normal, cataract, conjunctivitis, ectropion, trachoma, and pterygium, alongside details on their causes, symptoms, and preventative measures.

name: Raya
subtitle: Conversational AI for Unstructured Research Data
description: A conversational AI system that processes unstructured research data and enables document retrieval through natural language queries.

features.name: OCR
features.description: Convert scanned/unstructured documents into machine-readable text.

features.name: Document Repository
features.description: Store, organize, and manage all uploaded documents.

features.name: Multi
features.description: Document Selection-Choose multiple documents as the context for a chat session.

features.name: Conversational Search
features.description: Ask natural language questions about selected documents.

features.name: VectorDB Retrieval
features.description: Perform semantic search for accurate and relevant answers.

name: Kapi E-Commerce
subtitle: A React-based e-commerce platform (Customer Side)
description:
This repository is a practice full-stack project for building an e-commerce platform called Kapi. The goal is to simulate an online store experience and practice working with React (frontend), Node.js/Express (backend), and MySQL (database).

Kapi is designed as a sample coffee e-commerce website, where users can browse products, add items to a cart, and manage their profiles. The project serves as a playground for learning modern full-stack development, experimenting with UI/UX design, and practicing database integration.

features.name: Login / Signup
features.description: Authentication system for account creation and secure login.

features.name: Home
features.description: Landing page with product highlights, categories, and promotions.

features.name: Product
features.description: Browse products with filters, search, and sorting for a seamless shopping experience.

features.name: Cart
features.description: View, update, or remove items before checkout.

features.name: Checkout
features.description: Secure checkout process with order summary and payment options.

features.name: Order History
features.description: Track past orders with details and status updates.

features.name: Profile & Address Settings
features.description: Manage personal information, shipping addresses, and account preferences.
